text: Dominion Plaza is an office complex in Denver, Colorado. It consists of two adjoining towers, and was built in 1982. The taller one, Dominion Plaza South, is tall and has 28 floors. The buildings have pink granite facades and blue- tinted windows. ==See also== *List of tallest buildings in Denver ==References== *Denver Skyscrapers *Skyscraperpage Category:Skyscraper office buildings in Denver Category:Twin towers Category:1982 establishments in Colorado Category:Denver stubs Category:Office buildings completed in 1982
title: Dominion Plaza
